overview: Tri-Lingual (English - Spanish - Portuguese) professional with over 20 years of combined supervisory, administrative, human resources, financial budgeting, training, counseling and customer service experience in private and government sectors. Proven team player, with the ability to function effectively in fast-paced settings. able to work with diverse populations and environments. Analytical and Resourceful, mission-minded and eager to apply new skills/knowledge. Capable oral & written communication skills,
